title: 3.1 Master Challenge 3
question: Write the JavaScript code to create a class Book and define the properties like title, author, edition, NoOfPages, publicationYear, and Genres. Also define the methods associated with it, like displayBookDetails(), getBookAge(), and setTarget().

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
